duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee all retail operations within a geographic area and shape a pillar of the retail business.
Coach and develop Regional Managers and peer leaders, representing the Vice President and lululemon, as needed.
Drive implementation of business strategy, processes, and initiatives to ensure consistent store performance.
Leverage key metric insights to monitor progress toward financial and business objectives.
Create and execute a real estate growth strategy and drive market growth strategy.
Ensure financial goals are met and build retail leader capabilities and skillsets.
Represent the Vice President, host visitors and senior leaders, and represent lululemon in key events.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree or equivalent (MBA or equivalent post graduate degree in business, marketing, retail, or related field preferred)
